name: KingBall
description:
The game is a local multiplayer between 2 to 4 players where they fight with big hammers and many balls with which to throw themselves. 
There is only one king!

At the beginning... there was nothing

At the beginning I did not know anything about how to design a video game, a friend encouraged me to get into this jam and so I started ... 1 week to learn the basics of video games, collisions, areas, art, tilemap, etc.

I know that the game does not respect the motto of in the beginning there was nothing, but I think it was my beginning, where I did not know anything about video game design, my progress and the completion of this game my great start in this wonderful world.

The idea of this game was to create a fun fast-fighting game to play with friends in a house and have a good time, but because of the covid this will have to wait.
